lines.text: When you said go out, I didn't know you meant a deli sandwich and a motel.

You're the only one, who'll believe me when I say, I still don't know what happened. I mean I know what I did but I just don't understand how it all began. Was it my father, what he did to me? He says he's sorry now. Poor pathetic fool that he is. Or my mother that never stopped him.
Were you in love at first sight?
[Joey tries to kiss Amy but she pulls away]
Too early. My mom was till here. I had to tell her they were from me. I lied.
Right, of an old married guy.
Amy he's a sleaze. Won't even send the flowers to your house.
Oh yeah right, like my dad would really love that.
Theresa, I thought you were my friend?
I am! That's why I'm trying to talk to you, I mean what do you see in this guy anyway?
He loves me, we have great sex, and he fixes my car.
